onChange.script:
# reset the dates to defaults when a participant is picked from the participant table	
	if self.params.Selected_Id is None:
		self.getChild("root").getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").custom.mode = 0
		self.getChild("root").getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = self.custom.defaultDates.start
		self.getChild("root").getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").custom.origValue = None
		self.getChild("root").getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("ExpireDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = self.custom.defaultDates.expiry
		self.getChild("root").getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("ExpireDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").custom.origValue = None

transforms.code:
lst = []
	for x in value:
		lst.append({'label':x['xValue'],'value':x['xValue']})
	return lst

lst = []
	for y in value:
		lst.append({'label':int(y['yValue']),'value':int(y['yValue'])})
	return lst

onChange.script:
if previousValue is not None and previousValue.value is not None and (currentValue is None or currentValue.value is None):
		self.parent.parent.getChild("Placeholder_textinput").getChild("TextField").focus()

config.script:
self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").custom.mode = 0
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Column").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = None
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = None
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = self.view.custom.defaultDates.start
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("ExpireDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = self.view.custom.defaultDates.expiry
	self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Table_0").props.selection.selectedRow = None
	self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Table_0").props.selection.selectedColumn = None
	self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Table_0").props.selection.data = []
	
	self.view.params.Selected_Id = None

mode = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").custom.mode
	# mode of 0 is inserting a fresh record
	startDate = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value
	expDate = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("ExpireDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value
	id = self.view.params.Selected_Id
	if mode == 0:
		col = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Column").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
		bin = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").props.value
		
		participantId = self.view.params.Selected_Participant_Id
	
		
		now = system.date.now()
		
		if id is None: # add a new bin entry
			params = {'participantId': participantId,
					  'col'          : col,
					  'bin'          : bin,
					  'startOn'      : startDate,
					  'expireOn'     : expDate}
			
			system.perspective.print("=========StorageBin Assign Bin params=========")
			system.perspective.print(params)	
			system.db.runNamedQuery('Participants/Storage Bins/AssignBin', params)
	# mode of 1 we are updating an existing entry
	else: 
		params = {
				  'startOn'      : startDate,
				  'expireOn'     : expDate,
				  'id'           : id}
		
		system.perspective.print("=========StorageBin Update Bin params=========")
		system.perspective.print(params)
		system.db.runNamedQuery('Participants/Storage Bins/UpdateBin', params)
		
	system.perspective.sendMessage('storage_bin_refresh', payload = {})
#	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Status").refreshBinding("custom.Status")
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").custom.origValue = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value 
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("ExpireDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").custom.origValue = self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("ExpireDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value
	
	# COPY OF NEW BUTTON SCRIPT
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").custom.mode = 0
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Column").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = None
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = None
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = self.view.custom.defaultDates.start
	self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("ExpireDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = self.view.custom.defaultDates.expiry
	self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Table_0").props.selection.selectedRow = None
	self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Table_0").props.selection.selectedColumn = None
	self.parent.parent.parent.getChild("Table_0").props.selection.data = []
	
	self.view.params.Selected_Id = None

params = {'ExitAction': self.custom.ActionId, 
			  'StorageBinLogId': self.view.params.Selected_Id,
			  'Col': self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Column").getChild("Label_0").props.text,
			  'Bin': int(self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Label_0").props.text)
			  }
	dockId = 'BinModify'
	
	system.perspective.openDock(id = dockId,
								params = params)

params = {'ExitAction': self.custom.ActionId, 
			  'StorageBinLogId': self.view.params.Selected_Id,
			  'Col': self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Column").getChild("Label_0").props.text,
			  'Bin': int(self.parent.parent.getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Label_0").props.text)
			  }
	dockId = 'BinModify'
	
	system.perspective.openDock(id = dockId,
								params = params)

import traceback
	try:
		self.view.params.Selected_Id = event.value['id']
		self.parent.getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").custom.mode = 1
		self.parent.getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Column").getChild("Label_0").props.text = event.value['col']
		self.parent.getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Label_0").props.text = event.value['bin']
		self.parent.getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = event.value['startOn']
		self.parent.getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("StartDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").custom.origValue = event.value['startOn']
		self.parent.getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("ExpireDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").props.value = event.value['expireOn']
		self.parent.getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("ExpireDate").getChild("DateTimeInput").custom.origValue = event.value['expireOn']
				
		self.view.params.Selected_Participant_Id = event.value['participantId']
	except:
		system.perspective.print(traceback.format_exc())

transforms.code:
# val has: id action actionDate col bin participantId pfname pmname plname employeeId efname emname elname
	# res has: [id] pname column bin start exp exit evict sname
	result = []
	
	for row in value:
		rowStruct = {}
		rowStruct['style'] = {'classes': 'Table/Cell_Detail'}
		
		rowValue = {}
		rowValue['id'] = row['id']
		rowValue['col'] = row['col']
		rowValue['bin'] = row['bin']
		rowValue['participantId'] = row['participantId']
		rowValue['participantFullName'] = getName(row['participantFirstName'], row['participantMiddleName'], row['participantLastName'])
		rowValue['startOn'] = row['startOn']
		rowValue['expireOn'] = row['expireOn']
		
		exitAction = row['exitAction']
		exitedOn = row['exitedOn']
		exitedBy = getName(row['exitedByFirstName'], row['exitedByMiddleName'], row['exitedByLastName'])
		
		if exitAction == 1: # participant bin was exited
			rowValue['exitedOn'] = exitedOn
			rowValue['exitActionBy'] = exitedBy
			rowValue['evictedOn'] = None
		elif exitAction == 2: # participant bin was evicted
			rowValue['exitedOn'] = None
			rowValue['exitActionBy'] = exitedBy
			rowValue['evictedOn'] = exitedOn
		else:
			rowValue['exitedOn'] = None
			rowValue['exitActionBy'] = None
			rowValue['evictedOn'] = None
		
		if row['cancelledByStaffEmployeeId'] != None:
			rowValue['cancelledBy'] = getName(row['cancelledByFirstName'], row['cancelledByMiddleName'], row['cancelledByLastName'])
		else:
			rowValue['cancelledBy'] = None
				
		rowStruct['value'] = rowValue
		result.append(rowStruct)
	
	return result

def getName(fname, mname, lname):
	name = ''
	if fname:
		name += fname + ' '
	if mname:
		name += mname + ' '
	if lname:
		name += lname + ' '
	return name[:-1]

messageHandlers.script:
_selectedRow = payload.get('selectedRow')
	
	#ystem.perspective.print(('payload:',payload))
	
	if _selectedRow is None:
		self.props.selection.selectedRow = None
		self.props.selection.selectedColumn = None
		self.getSibling("Label").props.text = 'HERE IT IS'

# implement your handler here
	import traceback
	try:
		#Send the dataset to Excel
		filename = 'storage_bins_' + str(system.date.format(system.date.now(),"yyyyMMddHHmmss")) + '.xls'
		datasetJSON = self.props.data
		header = ['Participant','Column','Bin','Start','Exp','Exit','Evict','Staff']
		rows = []
		
		for oneData in datasetJSON:
			startOnDate = system.date.fromMillis(long(oneData['value']['startOn']))
			
			expireOnDate = system.date.fromMillis(long(oneData['value']['expireOn']))
			
			exitedOnDate = None
			if oneData['value']['exitedOn'] is not None:
				exitedOnDate = system.date.fromMillis(long(oneData['value']['exitedOn']))
			
			evictedOnDate = None
			if oneData['value']['evictedOn'] is not None:
				evictedOnDate = system.date.fromMillis(long(oneData['value']['evictedOn']))
			oneRow = [oneData['value']['participantFullName'],oneData['value']['col'],oneData['value']['bin'],startOnDate,expireOnDate,exitedOnDate,evictedOnDate,oneData['value']['exitActionBy']]
			rows.append(oneRow)
		
		dataset = system.dataset.toDataSet(header, rows)
		xlFile = system.dataset.toExcel(True,dataset)
		system.perspective.download(filename, xlFile)
	except:   
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants Dashboard tableToExcel")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

self.view.params.Selected_Participant_Id = payload['participantId']
	self.getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Column").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = None
	self.getChild("Bin Lookup Flex").getChild("BinSelectFlex").getChild("Bin").getChild("Dropdown").props.value = None
	self.view.params.Selected_Id = None
	self.getChild("Table_0").props.selection.selectedRow = -1
